settings.title: Drinks Reception
settings.text:
The octagonal shaped reception area of the distillery was once a horse-gang mill when the building was used as a farm steading for Cambo Estate. Our Horsegang area makes the perfect location for drinks receptions of up to 70 guests with beautiful views in every direction.

This area is a wonderful space for a drinks and canapé reception and opens onto a landscaped terrace where guests can pour outside on a summer evening. Direct access into our exhibition also allows for exclusive tours.

settings.title: Intimate Group Dinners
settings.text:
Both the Wemyss room and our Gin cottage are beautifully intimate settings for parties of up to 18 to dine in.

These spaces are available for a formal or informal private dinner for up to 18 guests. Our five course Whisky Tasting menu is a truly Scottish experience, with a dram of malt whisky matched perfectly with each course.

Perhaps a gin inspired menu in our Gin Cottage would be preferred, with each course complimented by a different Darnley's Gin.

settings.title: Large Group Dinners
settings.text: Our round horse gang mill can seat up to 40 people for more formal dinners, or up to 20 people on a long banquet table.

settings.title: Catering Locally Sourced Delicacies
settings.text:
The East Neuk of Fife is well known for its abundance of delicious produce including fish, shellfish, fine meat, vegetables and fruit.

Our caterers include as much of this produce as possible in the menus offered to guests who attend events and dinners at the distillery.

settings.title: Finishing Touches
settings.text: Should you be looking for an extra special experience here at the distillery, please let us know and we would be happy to arrange bagpipers, flowers and any other requests you may have.
